maqras.text: [Ej pajomʙar] Ojo Mo sinaatro [ʙaroi nuzuli vahj] ʙarojat nakusudem
Va sangini [-i ʙori gunoh va dusvorii risolat]-ro az [dusi] tu ʙarnadostem
Hamon [ʙore], ki ʙar pustat sangini mekard
Va [nomu] ovozai turo ʙaland soxtem
Pas, musallaman, ʙo [har] dusvori osoni ast
[Ore] Musallaman, ʙo [har] dusvori osoni ast
Pas, hangome ki [az koru umuri dunjo] foriƣ sudi, [ʙa iʙodati Parvardigorat] ʙikus
Va ʙa suji Parvardigorat roƣiʙ [va mustoq] sav
Savgand ʙa ancir va zajtun [va ʙa Falastin sarzamini ruisi onho]
Va savgand ʙa Turi Sino
Va savgand ʙa in sahri amn [Makka]
[Ki] Jaqinan, Mo insonro dar ʙehtarin surat [va ʙo fitrati pok] ofaridem
Sipas uro [ki inhirof joft] ʙa pasttarin [marohili] pasti ʙargardonidem
Magar kasone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista ancom dodand; pas, ʙaroi onon podose pojdor [dar pes] ast
Pas, [ej inson] ci cize ʙa'd [az in hama daloili ravsan] turo ʙa takziʙi [ruzi] cazo vo medorad
Ojo Alloh taolo ʙehtarin dovar [va hokimi mutlaq] nest
[Ej Pajomʙar] Bixon ʙa nomi Parvardigorat, ki [hastiro] ofarid
[Hamon Parvardigore, ki] Insonro az xuni ʙasta ofarid
Bixon va Parvardigorat [az hama] ʙuzurgvoratr ast
[Hamon] Kase, ki ʙa vasilai qalam [navistan] omuxt
Ba inson on ciro, ki namedonist, omuxt
Cunin nest [ki sumo mepindored]; haqqo, ki inson tuƣjon [va sarkasi] mekunad
[Ba'd] Az in ki xudro ʙenijoz [va tavongar] ʙuʙinad
Jaqinan, ʙozgast [-i hama] ʙa suji Parvardigori tust
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo didai on kase, ki [az iʙodati Alloh taolo] ʙozmedorad
Bandaero, hangome ki namoz mexonad
Ba man xaʙar ʙideh, agar in [ʙanda] ʙar [rohi] hidojat ʙosad
[Mardumro] Ba parhezkori farmon dihad [pas, sazoi kase, ki cunin ʙandaero ʙijozorad cist]
Ba man xaʙar deh, agar in [saxsi sarkas haqro] takziʙ kard va rujgardon sud [ojo sazovori azoʙ nest]
Ojo namedonad, ki ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo [hama a'molasro] meʙinad
Cunin nest [ki u gumon mekunad]; agar ʙoz naojad [va dast az sarorat ʙarnadorad], hatman, muji pesoniasro ʙa saxti xohem girift [va ʙa suji duzax xohem kasonid]
Muji pesonii [hamon] duruƣgui xatokorro
Pas, ʙojad hammaclisonasro [ʙa kumak] ʙixonad
Mo [niz] otasʙononi [duzax]-ro faro xohem xond
Cunin nest [ki u mepindorad]; hargiz uro itoat makun va sacda kun va [ʙa Alloh taolo] taqarruʙ cuj
Hamono Mo on [Qur'on]-ro dar saʙi qadr nozil kardem
Va tu ci doni saʙi qadr cist
Saʙi qadr ʙehtar az hazor moh ast
Faristagon va Ruh [Caʙrail] dar on [saʙ] ʙa farmoni Parvardigorason ʙaroi [ancomi] har kore nozil mesavand
[On saʙ] To tului facr salomat [va rahmat] ʙosad
Kasone az ahli kitoʙ va musrikon, ki kofir sudand, [az oini kufr] dast ʙarnamedorand, to in ki ʙaroi onon daleli ravsane ʙijojad
Pajomʙare az sui Alloh taolo [ʙijojad], ki sahifahoi pokro ʙixonad
Va dar on [sahifaho] navistahoe ustuvor [va durust] ast
Va kasone, ki ʙa onon kitoʙ doda sud, [az cumlai jahudijon va masehijon] parokanda nasudand, [va ixtilof nakardand] magar ʙa'd az on ki daleli ravsan ʙaroi onon omad

Va eson farmon najoftand, cuz in ki Allohro ʙiparastand, dar hole ki dini xudro ʙaroi u xolis gardonand [va az sirku ʙutparasti] ʙa tavhid ru ovarand; va namoz ʙarpo dorand va zakot ʙipardozand; va in ast oini rostin va mustaqim
Be gumon, kasone az ahli kitoʙ va musrikon, ki kofir sudand, covidona dar otasi cahannam xohand mond. Onon ʙadtarin ofaridagon hastand
Hamono kasone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista ancom dodand, onon ʙehtarini ofaridagon hastand

Podosi eson nazdi Parvardigorason ʙoƣhoi [ʙihisti] covidon ast, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on corist; hamesa dar on xohand mond; Alloh taolo az [a'moli] onho xusnud ast va onon [niz] az [podosi] U xusnudand; va in [maqom va podos] ʙaroi kasest, ki az Parvardigoras ʙitarsad
Hangome ki zamin ʙo sadidtarin takonhojas ʙa larza darojad
Va zamin ʙorhoi sanginasro ʙerun rezad
Va inson megujad: «On [zamin]-ro ci sudaast?»
Dar on ruz [zamin] tamomi xaʙarhojasro ʙozgu mekunad
Zero Parvardigorat ʙa u [cunin] vahj [va hukm] kardaast
Dar on ruz mardum guruh-guruh ʙozmegardand, to [naticai] a'molason ʙa onon nison doda savad
Pas, har kas ʙa andozai zarrae kori nek ancom doda ʙosad, [podosi] onro meʙinad
Va har kas ʙa andozai zarrae kori ʙad karda ʙosad, [kajfari] onro meʙinad
Savgand ʙa asphoi davanda, ki nafaszanon [ʙa suji majdoni cihod] pes meraftand
Va savgand ʙa asphoe, ki [ʙo ʙarxurdi sumhojason ʙa sangho] sarorai [otas] ecod kardand
Boz savgand ʙa asphoe, ki dar suʙhgohon [ʙar dusman] juris ʙarand
Pas, dar on hangom gardu ƣuʙor ʙarangezand
On goh ʙa mijoni [sipohi dusman] darojand
Jaqinan, inson dar ʙaroʙari [ne'mathoi] Parvardigoras ʙisjor nosipos ast
Va ʙe gumon, u ʙar in [nosiposi] guvoh ast
Va hamono u aloqai farovone ʙa mol [-i dunjo] dorad
